content: what do you do when your scrap basket is out of control make yoyos each yoyo takes less than 10 feet of yarn so even a very small scrap ball will make at least one this pattern shows a method for joining yoyos which mimics the look of priscilla hewitt s flat braid joining with far fewer ends to weave join a row of as many yoyos as you like with just one strand of yarn please note this is duplicate pattern for the yoyo square the other project links are here 1 follow my pattern page on facebook 1 or visit my blog 2 1 https //www facebook com/yarncrazy 2 www yarncrazy com 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-yoyo-square
